description: Write the odd positive integers on labels in numerical order, forming an infinite sequence L. Consider the succession of single digits of L: 1 3 5 7 9 1 1 1 3 1 5 1 7 1 9 2 1 2 3 2 5 2 7 2 9 3 1 ... (A031312). This sequence is a derangement of L that produces the same succession of digits, subject to the constraint that the smallest unused label must be used that does not lead to a contradiction.
